item.description:
Since I've had to cancel an outdoor event recently due to weather, I think it's time for some indoor activity :)

Acoustic guitarist/Singer/Songwriter Becky Chace will be performing at the Vanilla Bean Cafe in Pomfret on Saturday, February 5 beginning around 7.30. This is a very cool little venue which often has acoustic folk performers. It also has art exhibitions and excellent food/wine/beer etc.
There's a suggested cover of 12$, but not mandatory.

I'll stake out a table in the room where the stage is :)

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be at a table in the room where the performance is happening.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Live Acoustic Music @ the Vanilla Bean
